Description: Ring foot and base sherd of Egyptian black ware pottery bowl; dark grey Nile silt fabric; dull and very worn black slip on interior and exterior; inscription in interior.
Bibliographic references: Petrie 1886 / Naukratis. Part I., 1884-85 (pl. XXXIV, no. 615)
Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (p. 673, no. 317)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (IC.073)
